name: In Five Colors Dyed
description: When your Chiori, who has this equipped, uses Fluttering Hasode: Summon 1 additional Tranquilly Taking Ten Tamoto, and Select 1 of 4 Chiori's Automaton Dolls before also summoning it.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1609], who has this equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S16092]</color>: Summon 1 additional <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116094]</color>, and $[K59] 1 of 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116097]</color> before also summoning it.
descriptionreplaced: When your Chiori, who has this equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fluttering Hasode</color>: Summon 1 additional <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tranquilly Taking Ten Tamoto</color>, and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Select</color> 1 of 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chiori's Automaton Dolls</color> before also summoning it.
